name: RTCPeerConnection.getTransceivers
description: The RTCPeerConnection interface's getTransceivers() method returns a list of the RTCRtpTransceiver objects being used to send and receive data on the connection.
content: The RTCPeerConnection interface's getTransceivers() method returns a list of the RTCRtpTransceiver objects being used to send and receive data on the connection.
